title: The Best of Dilbert: Volume 2
description: More of the very best strips that have made us laugh over the years in a convenient and affordable format. The Best of Dilbert : Volume 2 will be a feast of the very best comic strips from Scott Adam's prolific output and is destined to be a big hit with Dilbert's myriad supporters. Featuring one carefully selected strip per page, it will chronicle the ups and downs of Dilbert and his cohorts, from his megalomaniac dog, Dogbert, to his clueless pointy-haired boss, this book will be a hilarious roller-coaster ride through the lunacies of modern corporate life.
author: Scott Adams
